section.heading: Reference to chapter 1223

content.p: Provisions of law relating to retired pay for nonregular service are set forth in chapter 1223 of this title (beginning with section 12731).

section.sourceCredit: (Added Pub. L. 103–337, div. A, title XVI, § 1662(j)(7), Oct. 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 3005.)
